title: iLike
author: iLike
content: I`m looking for a job as Bounty Spreadsheet checker, I have more than 2 years experienced of related job.

comments.author: X-ray
comments.body: Quote from: iLike on August 18, 2022, 05:13:31 AMI`m looking for a job as Bounty Spreadsheet checker, I have more than 2 years experienced of related job.If you are looking a job as a bounty spreadsheet checker and then it's better if you are contacting any manager directly for that. Since they were managing so many campaign and i guess that if they were not actively watching this section. I hope that you can get what you want but your reputation doesn't seem to be a good thing to be hired by them. This suggestion is good for you. Contact any manager to offer your service and let's see how they will be seeing it.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: iLike on August 18, 2022, 05:13:31 AMI`m looking for a job as Bounty Spreadsheet checker, I have more than 2 years experienced of related job.Then post all of your experiences here and what are the projects that you've worked on for the past 2 years. That's going to make you and your possible clients convenient to see what type of projects you've worked with.In short, put your portfolio in here and any other experiences, related or not to the position that you're applying for. Usually check the services and marketplace altcoins as clients and project developers are usually posting there looking to fill a position like this.

comments.author: Kavelj22
comments.body: Quote from: blockman on August 20, 2022, 11:31:31 AMQuote from: iLike on August 18, 2022, 05:13:31 AMI`m looking for a job as Bounty Spreadsheet checker, I have more than 2 years experienced of related job.Then post all of your experiences here and what are the projects that you've worked on for the past 2 years. That's going to make you and your possible clients convenient to see what type of projects you've worked with.In short, put your portfolio in here and any other experiences, related or not to the position that you're applying for. Usually check the services and marketplace altcoins as clients and project developers are usually posting there looking to fill a position like this.I do not think that this is possible for him, I mean, I do not think that he can prove the experiences that he claims to have, since he uses an empty account of posts or any evidence mentioned, and most likely if his allegations are true, he has used an alternative account during the two years and according to the assessment of confidence on his account He probably wasn't smart enough to do a precise job.Anyway, I have not heard that there is someone who works in this job before because campaign managers do this by themselves or with the help of bots.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: Kavelj22 on August 20, 2022, 08:20:51 PMQuote from: blockman on August 20, 2022, 11:31:31 AMQuote from: iLike on August 18, 2022, 05:13:31 AMI`m looking for a job as Bounty Spreadsheet checker, I have more than 2 years experienced of related job.Then post all of your experiences here and what are the projects that you've worked on for the past 2 years. That's going to make you and your possible clients convenient to see what type of projects you've worked with.In short, put your portfolio in here and any other experiences, related or not to the position that you're applying for. Usually check the services and marketplace altcoins as clients and project developers are usually posting there looking to fill a position like this.I do not think that this is possible for him, I mean, I do not think that he can prove the experiences that he claims to have, since he uses an empty account of posts or any evidence mentioned, and most likely if his allegations are true, he has used an alternative account during the two years and according to the assessment of confidence on his account He probably wasn't smart enough to do a precise job.Anyway, I have not heard that there is someone who works in this job before because campaign managers do this by themselves or with the help of bots.We don't know, he said that he's got 2 years' experience so he has to prove that he really has. Well, project owners that are meticulous would ask him the same thing.But if not, then they're just accepting anyone that can do the job even without experience. That's all on them and maybe some managers have their own assistants that do this job before.So, if a manager needs one, I don't think that they'll have to look for one as they'll just ask those people that they've worked with before but for new projects, they might think of him and consider.

comments.author: Findingnemo
comments.body: Quote from: iLike on August 18, 2022, 05:13:31 AMI`m looking for a job as Bounty Spreadsheet checker, I have more than 2 years experienced of related job.It doesn't work like that, unless the bounty manager really needs some assistance to help with the spreadsheet calculations but I feel the bounty era ended a long way back no nit many of the trusted manager is really managing the bounties because it hardly pays the real money once in a while, anyway good luck

comments.author: Jawhead999
comments.body: Most of campaign managers wouldn't hire bounty spreadsheet checker since it's their job and they can do that. The thing is you're a newbie account and have been exposed since you're a cheaters with your alt accounts. I think the reason why you want to become a campaign manager assistant is you're want to take advantages by giving more stakes to your alt accounts, so you make all of your alt accounts are eligible for the payment.

comments.author: Kavelj22
comments.body: Quote from: Jawhead999 on August 21, 2022, 09:42:23 AMMost of campaign managers wouldn't hire bounty spreadsheet checker since it's their job and they can do that. In the campaigns that are launched in the altcoins section, the supervisor has to verify the entries of subscribers on social media such as Facebook, Twitter, and others. The number of subscribers is in the thousands, and it is normal for the campaign manager to need help either from his assistants assigning them to work for him, or by developing a bot to help him work.However, this is no longer necessary given the very low number of campaigns in that section compared to previous years.

comments.author: salad daging
comments.body: Quote from: bitkanu on August 21, 2022, 03:32:45 PMI think that bounty managers can to that alone even they have their own assistant for that. I think that i would prefer to see you are making your own portfolios visible for anyone here. Im sure that some members were also giving you the right explanation about that. It seems like that you need a very hard effort to let those managers to see you as their assistant for spreadsheet checking. Any manager won't need him because a newbie account with a bad reputation of course no one will glance at him this is a trick for him to place a lot of bets on his alt account with what Jawhead999 says so don't be surprised he will definitely insist on this.The task of checking the bounty spreadsheet for every manager has already been arranged, whether he is himself or his assistant because what I know as a bounty manager is that there is always a team formed by them.

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Quote from: iLike on August 18, 2022, 05:13:31 AMI`m looking for a job as Bounty Spreadsheet checker, I have more than 2 years experienced of related job.You have two years of experience and part of that experience is how to cheat bounties I checked your trust rating and this is what's on itQuoteA bot or a farmer. Will post reports after a warning that the bounty campaign is over. I would not hire you if I'm a bounty manager, if you have this cheating character for all we know you're just going to credit all your bots and alt account if you want to be part of a bounty team you have to set an example because what you've done will just come back to you.
